PlannedShot_TENNO.NAME: Spray and Pray
PlannedShot_TENNO.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Put a random Skill from your draw pile into your hand.
PlannedShot_TENNO.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Put !M! random Skills from your draw pile into your hand.

Aviator_TENNO.NAME: Aviator
Aviator_TENNO.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. Put a random Attack from your draw pile into your hand.
Aviator_TENNO.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. Put !M! random Attacks from your draw pile into your hand.

VoidStrike_TENNO.NAME: Void Strike
VoidStrike_TENNO.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Add a Void into your discard pile.

HeavySlam_TENNO.NAME: Heavy Slam
HeavySlam_TENNO.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Costs [E] less if you played a Skill this turn.

CleansingStrike_TENNO.NAME: Cleansing Strike
CleansingStrike_TENNO.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Exhaust a Void from your draw pile or discard pile.
CleansingStrike_TENNO.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Exhaust two Voids from your draw pile or discard pile.

Meditation_TENNO.NAME: Meditation
Meditation_TENNO.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. Exhaust a Void from your draw pile or discard pile.
Meditation_TENNO.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. Exhaust two Voids from your draw pile or discard pile.

TapDodge_TENNO.NAME: Tap Dodge
TapDodge_TENNO.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. This turn, your next Attack is played twice.

BurstStrike_TENNO.NAME: Burst Strike
BurstStrike_TENNO.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. This turn, your next Skill is played twice.

DailyLogin_TENNO.NAME: Daily Login
DailyLogin_TENNO.DESCRIPTION: Add a random Attack and Skill into your hand. They cost 0 this turn. Exhaust.

RollingGuard_TENNO.NAME: Rolling Guard
RollingGuard_TENNO.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. Gain 1 Intangible. Retain. Exhaust.

CleavingWhirlwind_TENNO.NAME: Cleaving Whirlwind
CleavingWhirlwind_TENNO.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to all enemies. If this kills an enemy, put a copy of this into your hand that costs 0.

EqualLaceration_TENNO.NAME: Equal Laceration
EqualLaceration_TENNO.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to all enemies. Ethereal. Exhaust.

CuttingPoise_TENNO.NAME: Cutting Poise
CuttingPoise_TENNO.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage three times. Ethereal. Exhaust.

LancingJustice_TENNO.NAME: Lancing Justice
LancingJustice_TENNO.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Apply !M! Weak. Apply !M! Vulnerable. Ethereal. Exhaust.

BlindingSlice_TENNO.NAME: Blinding Slice
BlindingSlice_TENNO.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. The target loses !M! Strength this turn.

UmbralFiber_TENNO.NAME: Umbral Fiber
UmbralFiber_TENNO.DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, gain !M! Block. Gain !B! Block.

UmbralIntensify_TENNO.NAME: Umbral Intensify
UmbralIntensify_TENNO.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Strength. Your next card this turn is played twice.

UmbralHowl_TENNO.NAME: Umbral Howl
UmbralHowl_TENNO.DESCRIPTION: ALL enemies lose !M! Strength this turn. NL Apply 2 Weak and Vulnerable to ALL enemies. NL Exhaust.

UmbralForm_TENNO.NAME: Umbral Form
UmbralForm_TENNO.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, add an Umbral card into your hand.
UmbralForm_TENNO.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, add an upgraded Umbral card into your hand.

GrowingPower_TENNO.NAME: Growing Power
GrowingPower_TENNO.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you apply a debuff to an enemy, gain !M! Strength

WildFrenzy_TENNO.NAME: Wild Frenzy
WildFrenzy_TENNO.DESCRIPTION: This turn, your Attacks are played twice. Reduce the cost of Attacks in your hand by 1 this turn.

VoidRadiance_TENNO.NAME: Void Radiance
VoidRadiance_TENNO.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust all Voids, then deal !D! damage to a random enemy for each Void exhausted this combat.

ConditionOverload_TENNO.NAME: Condition Overload
ConditionOverload_TENNO.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Deals !M! extra damage for each unique debuff on the enemy.

Cataclysm_TENNO.NAME: Cataclysm
Cataclysm_TENNO.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to all enemies. ALL fighters gain 1 Intangible. Add a Void into your discard pile.

ChromaticBlade_TENNO.NAME: Chromatic Blade
ChromaticBlade_TENNO.DESCRIPTION: Whenever an Attack deals unblocked damage, randomly apply 1 Weak, Vulnerable, or temporary Strength loss.

CovertLethality_TENNO.NAME: Covert Lethality
CovertLethality_TENNO.DESCRIPTION: Instantly kill a non-elite, non-boss enemy if it is Vulnerable. Otherwise do !D! damage.

VoidDash_TENNO.NAME: Void Dash
VoidDash_TENNO.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Gain !B! Block. Add a Void into your discard pile.

AgileGuard_TENNO.NAME: Agile Guard
AgileGuard_TENNO.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. A random Attack in your hand costs [E] less this turn.

FlyingShot_TENNO.NAME: Flying Shot
FlyingShot_TENNO.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage. A random Skill in your hand costs [E] less this turn.

CorrosiveProjection_TENNO.NAME: Corrosive Projection
CorrosiveProjection_TENNO.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, apply 1 Vulnerable to a random enemy.
CorrosiveProjection_TENNO.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, apply 1 Vulnerable to a random enemy. Innate.

FatalTeleport_TENNO.NAME: Fatal Teleport
FatalTeleport_TENNO.DESCRIPTION: An enemy loses !M! Strength this turn. Apply 2 Vulnerable. Exhaust.
FatalTeleport_TENNO.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: An enemy loses !M! Strength this turn. Apply 3 Vulnerable. Exhaust.

RadiantJavelins_TENNO.NAME: Radiant Javelin
RadiantJavelins_TENNO.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust a Void from your draw pile or discard pile. Deal !D! damage. Deals !M! additional damage for each Void exhausted this combat.

HunterAdrenaline_TENNO.NAME: Hunter Adrenaline
HunterAdrenaline_TENNO.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you receive attack damage, reduce the cost of a random card in your hand by 1 at the start of your next turn.

Flurry_TENNO.NAME: Flurry
Flurry_TENNO.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Draw a card. If you draw a skill, reduce its cost by 1 this turn.

Reposition_TENNO.NAME: Reposition
Reposition_TENNO.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. Draw a card. If you draw a skill, reduce its cost by 1 this turn.

SplitChamber_TENNO.NAME: Split Chamber
SplitChamber_TENNO.DESCRIPTION: Copy each card in your hand with reduced cost.

TransferenceBeam_TENNO.NAME: Transference Beam
TransferenceBeam_TENNO.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage X times. Apply X Weak and Vulnerable.

DefensiveThrow_TENNO.NAME: Defensive Throw
DefensiveThrow_TENNO.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to all enemies. Gain !B! Block for each enemy.

SelfImprovement_TENNO.NAME: Self Improvement
SelfImprovement_TENNO.DESCRIPTION: Draw a card. It costs [E] less this combat. Exhaust.
SelfImprovement_TENNO.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw two cards. They cost [E] less this combat. Exhaust.

Versatility_TENNO.NAME: Versatility
Versatility_TENNO.DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 Strength. Gain 1 Dexterity. Draw a card.
Versatility_TENNO.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 Strength. Gain 1 Dexterity. Draw two cards.

CombatKnowledge_TENNO.NAME: Combat Knowledge
CombatKnowledge_TENNO.DESCRIPTION: Gain Block equal to the number of cards in your hand. Draw !M! cards.
CombatKnowledge_TENNO.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain Block equal to the number of cards in your hand +3. Draw !M! cards.

ExploitOptions_TENNO.NAME: Falling Kick
ExploitOptions_TENNO.DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal to the number of cards in your hand. Draw !M! cards
ExploitOptions_TENNO.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal to the number of cards in your hand +3. Draw !M! cards.

LinkedNarta_TENNO.NAME: Linked Narta
LinkedNarta_TENNO.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a card this turn, draw a card.

MasterfulCombination_TENNO.NAME: Masterful Combination
MasterfulCombination_TENNO.DESCRIPTION: Put an Attack and a Skill from your draw pile into your hand. Exhaust.

BlindRage_TENNO.NAME: Blind Rage
BlindRage_TENNO.DESCRIPTION: Play a random Attack from your draw pile.

Cripple_TENNO.NAME: Cripple
Cripple_TENNO.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Weak and Vulnerable to an enemy.

ReturnStroke_TENNO.NAME: Return Stroke
ReturnStroke_TENNO.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Put a card from your discard pile into your hand. Exhaust.
ReturnStroke_TENNO.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Put a card from your discard pile into your hand.

Duplication_TENNO.DESCRIPTION: Choose a card in your hand. Make a copy that costs [E] less.
Duplication_TENNO.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Choose a card in your hand. Make a copy that costs 0.

QuickThinking_TENNO.NAME: Quick Thinking
QuickThinking_TENNO.DESCRIPTION: Draw cards until your hand is full. Exhaust.

Scattershot_TENNO.NAME: Scattershot
Scattershot_TENNO.DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, deal !M! damage to a random enemy for each card in your hand.

VoidBlast_TENNO.NAME: Void Blast
VoidBlast_TENNO.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Costs [E] less for each Void exhausted this combat.

Snipe_TENNO.NAME: Snipe
Snipe_TENNO.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Dexterity affects this card.

EmbraceTheVoid_TENNO.NAME: Embrace the Void

ConcealedWeapons_TENNO.NAME: Concealed Weapons
ConcealedWeapons_TENNO.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block for each other Attack in your hand. NL Deal !D! damage for each Skill in your hand.

Resourcefulness_TENNO.NAME: Resourcefulness
Resourcefulness_TENNO.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, add a random Attack and Skill to your hand.
Resourcefulness_TENNO.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, add a random Attack and Skill to your hand, and upgrade them.

VoidCorruption_TENNO.NAME: Void Corruption
VoidCorruption_TENNO.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, gain [E] and add a Void to your discard pile.
VoidCorruption_TENNO.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, gain [E] and add a Void to your discard pile. Innate.

VoidKnowledge_TENNO.NAME: Void Knowledge
VoidKnowledge_TENNO.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. Add a Void into your discard pile. Exhaust.

VoidAttunement_TENNO.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you draw a Void, gain [E] and draw a card.
VoidAttunement_TENNO.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Whenever you draw a Void, gain [E] [E] and draw 2 cards.

LashOut_TENNO.NAME: Lash Out
LashOut_TENNO.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and apply 1 Weak to a random enemy !M! times.

FinishingTouch_TENNO.NAME: Finishing Touch

ExpertTechnique_TENNO.NAME: Expert Technique
ExpertTechnique_TENNO.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Gain !B! Block. If you have at least 5 other cards in your hand, do it twice.

VoidGuard_TENNO.NAME: Void Guard
VoidGuard_TENNO.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. Add a Void to your discard pile.

NotMachineLearning_TENNO.NAME: Breadth of Knowledge
NotMachineLearning_TENNO.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, draw 1 additional card.

VoidIgnition_TENNO.NAME: Void Ignition
VoidIgnition_TENNO.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you exhaust a Void, deal !M! damage to all enemies.

DriftingContact_TENNO.NAME: Drifting Contact
DriftingContact_TENNO.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you apply a debuff to an enemy, gain !M! Block.

PurgeCorruption_TENNO.NAME: Purge Corruption
PurgeCorruption_TENNO.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust all Voids. Gain !B! Block for each Void exhausted this way.

DrinkTheKuva_TENNO.NAME: Drink the Kuva
DrinkTheKuva_TENNO.DESCRIPTION: Put Voids in your hand until you have !M! cards in hand. Exhaust.

PlanAhead_TENNO.NAME: Plan Ahead

PlanAhead_TENNO.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. Draw !M! cards. Put a card from your hand onto the top of your draw pile.

NinjaSkills_TENNO.NAME: Tenno Mastery
NinjaSkills_TENNO.DESCRIPTION: Every time you play 3 Attacks in a single turn, gain !M! Dexterity. NL Every time you play 3 Skills in a single turn, gain !M! Strength.

Gut_TENNO.NAME: Gut
Gut_TENNO.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Draw a card for each unique debuff the enemy has.

Parkour_TENNO.NAME: Parkour
Parkour_TENNO.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a card with reduced cost, draw a card.
Parkour_TENNO.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a card with reduced cost, draw !M! cards.

Reserves_TENNO.NAME: Reserves
Reserves_TENNO.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL When you draw this, draw a card.
Reserves_TENNO.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL When you draw this, draw !M! cards.
